comment.body: I've had similar issues. The problem only persists if I try to use TOR.
comment.body_p: I've had similar issues. The problem only persists if I try to use TOR.

topic.title: Great Firewall of China
topic.body:
How are so many Chinese users using ZeroNet? Why are they accessible outside China? Trying to understand how they are getting around GFW? 

I'm hoping to use ZN as a platform for communicating safely with missionaries in China, but I need to understand if it is reliable or not. Do Chinese users often find themselves blocked or unable to access zites hosted outside the US?
topic.body_p: How are so many Chinese users using ZeroNet? Why are they accessible outside China? Trying to understand how they are getting around GFW? I'm hoping to use ZN as a platform for communicating safely with missionaries in China, but I need to understand if it is reliable or not. Do Chinese users often find themselves blocked or unable to access zites hosted outside the US?
